com.madrobot.ui.widgets

Class SortableListView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListView
      • com.madrobot.ui.widgets.SortableListView

  • public class SortableListView
extends ListView
    ListView that can be sorted using touch gestures.

    Important

    • The adapter should be an instance of an array adapter.
    • List header and footer cannot be added for this ListView.
    Attribute Type Default Description
    normalHeight dimension 65 Height of the view that can be dragged
    expandedHeight dimension 0 Expanded height
    grabberView reference to a view id -1 Id of the view to be used for dragging the List Item. Eg: <your_namespace>:grabberView="@id/myIcon"
    draggingBackgroundDrawable drawable 0xfffffff Background to be set for a view that is being dragged for sorting
    removeMode none
    fling
    slide
    slideRight
    slideLeft
    		 none The gesture which removes a list item in dragging mode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SortableListView.DragListener
      Listener f
      static interface  SortableListView.DropListener
      A Drop listener informs when a item that needs to be sorted is dropped
      static interface  SortableListView.RemoveListener
      A RemoveListener recieves notifications when an item is removed from the list

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int REMOVE_MODE_FLING
      Fling to remove an item from the list
      static int REMOVE_MODE_NONE
      Items cannote be removed from the list
      static int REMOVE_MODE_SLIDE_LEFT
      Slide left to remove a list item
      static int REMOVE_MODE_SLIDE_RIGHT
      Slide right to remove a list item
